title: Indigenous group in Canada announces discovery of hundreds of unmarked graves
content:
1. Indigenous group in Canada announces discovery of hundreds of unmarked graves  Reuters
  2. Alberta pledges 8M to help First Nations locate and honour graves at residential schools  Global News
  3. Unmarked graves found at another former residential school in Canada  The Washington Post
  4. Could take "decades" to identify remains in unmarked graves: expert  CTV News
  5. Hundreds of bodies reported found in unmarked graves at former Saskatchewan residential school  National Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
